userRejected: Transaction was rejected in your wallet.
noRoute: No swap route found between the selected tokens. Try a smaller amount or a different pair.
insufficientLiquidity: Not enough liquidity in the pool for this trade. Try a smaller amount or another route.
amountTooLow: Amount too low for this pool. Increase the input amount.
insufficientOutputAmount: Minimum output not met due to price movement.{{hint}}
slippageHint: Increase slippage (currently {{slippagePct}}%) or reduce the trade size.
slippageHintGeneric: Increase slippage or reduce the trade size.
deadlineHint: Increase the deadline (currently {{deadlineMins}} min) and try again.
deadlineHintGeneric: Increase the deadline and try again.
invalidRoute: Invalid route. Please reselect tokens or try a different pair.
tokenNotApproved: Token is not approved for spending. Please approve the token and try again.
insufficientEthBalance: Insufficient ETH balance. You need at least {{amount}} ETH to complete this bridge operation.
insufficientEthBalanceGeneric: Insufficient ETH balance to complete this bridge operation.
insufficientBalance: Not enough balance to complete this operation.
networkError: Network connection issue. Please check your connection and try again.
contractError: Contract interaction failed. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
gasError: Transaction failed due to insufficient gas. Please try again with higher gas settings.
invalidAmount: Invalid amount entered. Please enter a valid positive amount.
quoteFailed: Unable to get a price quote. Try again in a moment.
swapFailed: Swap failed. Please review your amounts and settings and try again.{{debugInfo}}
addLiquidityFailed: Adding liquidity failed. Check amounts and try again.
removeLiquidityFailed: Removing liquidity failed. Check amounts and try again.
genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
